name: A Cat's Night 2: Orazio goes to town
name_original: A Cat's Night 2: Orazio goes to town
description: The game take place some months after the first A Cat's Night, now Orazio live with in the city of Forlì with a Family and other cats. But the streets of Forlì are not safe for dogs and cats, because a group of evil people kidnaps the animals and take them away with a white van. The Feline Council decides to ask for help to the hero of the cattery Emergenza Randagi, Orazio!
